clinical_study.brief_title: Disease Characteristics, Treatment Patterns and Clinical Outcomes in Patients With Newly Diagnosed Unresectable Stage IIIB/IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) in China
clinical_study.official_title: An Observational Study of Patients With Newly Diagnosed Unresectable Stage IIIB or IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) in China

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observational study is to describe patient and disease characteristics as well as treatment patterns in Chinese patients with unresectable stage IIIB or IV non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC). In addition, this study characterizes the clinical outcomes for various populations of patients defined by clinical and tumor characteristics, treatment patterns, and hospital category defined by city tier and geographic region.

primary_outcome.measure: Score Tumor Characteristics Based on Tumor Histology, Stage, Grade, and Lung Cancer Molecular Profile
primary_outcome.time_frame: At enrollment, during quarterly and semi-annual follow up and at end of study up to 1.5 years

primary_outcome.measure: Grade of Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status
primary_outcome.time_frame: At enrollment, during quarterly and semi-annual follow up and at end of study up to 1.5 years

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment Patterns of First-Line and Subsequent Treatments
primary_outcome.time_frame: At enrollment, during quarterly and semi-annual follow up and at end of study up to 1.5 years
From enrollment to end of study up to 1.5 years
From enrollment to end of study up to 1.5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Score Health Economic Status Based on Household Income, Diagnosis and Treatment Costs, and Insurance Coverage
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At enrollment, during quarterly and semi-annual follow up and at end of study up to 1.5 years
From enrollment to end of study up to 1.5 years
From enrollment to end of study up to 1.5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Non-Serious AEs of Special Interest (AESIs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From enrollment to end of study up to 1.5 years

clinical_study.condition: Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer, Lung Cancer, Cancer

arm_group.description: Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier 1 city in northern region of China
Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier 1 city in southern region of China
Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier city in middle region of China
Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier 2 city in northern region of China
Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier 2 city in south eastern region of China
Site as described by tier level of the city where the site is located and by geographical location: Tier 2 city in south western region of China

intervention.description: No intervention administered in this study

study_pop.textblock: Participants with newly diagnosed, unresectable Stage IIIB or IV non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histologically/cytologically confirmed, unresectable Stage IIIB or IV non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)
- Received at least one anti-cancer treatment targeting unresectable Stage IIIB or IV NSCLC in the study site after study initiation
- Radiographic evidence of disease
Exclusion Criteria:
- Prior systematic treatment for unresectable Stage IIIB or IV non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC)
- Participation in any anti-cancer, regimen-specified clinical study of first-line treatment for unresectable Stage IIIB or IV NSCLC.
